column5: I,ll be heading down there early Saturday morning,and would like to chuck some spoons for salmon for a couple hours. Where should I go?  Thanks
Ignore what Cliff said in his PM and read mine!  LOL!
If he joins you Will, he can still thank me....LOL.

hope they aren't my spoons you.re chucking...lol chucking ..wonder where that word came from    In the sport of cricket, throwing, commonly referred to as chucking, is an illegal bowling action which occurs when a bowler straightens their arm when delivering the ball.   Vomiting (known medically as emesis and informally as throwing up and numerous other terms) as up-chucking     OK
Good to know Terry, thanks.  lol.  I suppose he could Cliff but I'd encourage him not to.
